author: Alessandra Foresto
title: Selena Gomez's Street Style Looks Can Teach You a Thing or 2 About Dressing Sexy
text:
Selena Gomez's Sexiest Street Style Selena Gomez's Street Style Looks Can Teach You a Thing or 2 About Dressing Sexy March 6, 2017   Selena Gomez's Street Style Looks Can Teach You a Thing or 2 About Dressing Sexy 
Selena Gomez 's red carpet appearances and Instagram feed aren't the only sexy things about the singer and actress. Her street style deserves a spot on that list, too. 
The jean cutoffs and low-cut dresses, the crop tops and sexy heels , the short hems and tight curve-showing swimsuits â€” they are all pieces Selena wears out and about on her days off that ooze the same, if not more, sensuality than any backless, shimmery, mermaid gown she could sport to an award show. 
Though we might not all be able to get our hands on Selena's everyday designer garb, we can surely learn a lot about dressing sexy from her best street style. Here are 17 tips you need to live by. Related:
